activities: Provision of technology services for medical, health and wellness sectors, including but not limited to medical tourism, remote second opinions, medical consultations, surgery, medical appointments, health and wellness services to medical and health providers all over the world.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, off-line, manually processed, medical/health data
recoursemech: If an individual has any questions or concerns about our Safe Harbor practices, we ask them to write or email us at our contact information provided.   We will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of Personal Information in accordance with the Safe Harbor Principles. If after contacting us, an individual’s complaint or dispute has not been resolved, s/he can contact the EU data protection authorities and/or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
